ValidationRule.description: GTMS-26995: Remove Validation for "Returning Opportunity" field on C&R Transactions
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( ISBLANK(Returning_Opportunity__c), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Remorse Refund"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, "Contract Cancellation")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, "")), NOT($Permission.Validation_Exemption_Opportunity), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator API', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Minimum Access - API Only Integrations' ), true, false)
